  • WIFI access
  • 1 locker
  • Access to the first or second wave-breaker of the main stages
  • Exclusive Experience Entrance to the festival area

AMF Camping

It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

Pre-build tents

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts.

Download

Camping Packages

A spot on our camping in a pre-set tent. Access to our exclusive pre- and afterparties, on Friday and Saturday evening. Access both festival days on Saturday and Sunday.

Download

AMF Extras

Add some cool extra's to make your experience even better!

Private transfer

€269

Private transfer between your hotel and the Amsterdam Arena and back. The driver will pick you up at any time.

AMF Cap

€25

The night is what you live for. This cap is what you need! Together we own the night.

Tickets

€80

Select official AMF Regular or AMF VIP Tickets. VIP ticket includes separate VIP entrance, VIP deck at the Mainstage and a free locker.

Breakfast

€15

Wake up to a wonderful breakfast with fresh rolls, croissants, various spreads, fruit, coffee, tea and juices.

Why book with us

Official AMF Packages

On Saturday October 21, AMF will return to the Amsterdam ArenA with thousands of worldwide EDM fans to take on the night with some of the best DJs in the world. Join us and book your official AMF package with AMF Travel.

Select Your Experience

AMF Travel offers fans a personalised travel experience. You can create your AMF package with entrance tickets, hotel of your choice and camping, transfer to/from the venue and other convenient extra's.

Best value

The AMF travel team has selected the best places to stay for the best rates. We offer you safe and convenient transfer to/from the venue and a 24/7 service number during your stay for a relaxed and carefree stay in Amsterdam

Fast service

Your official E-tickets and reservation will be send to you straight away, after you have completed your booking. Contact us for large groups and special wishes via info@eventagent.nl or WhatsApp on +31(0)6 52 382 382
